title: Part-Time Community & Engagement Assistant (Childcare Brands – 20 hrs/week)
job_overview:
We’re a company helping modern families find trusted childcare:

Little Minders is a curated babysitting membership connecting busy parents with fully vetted sitters.
House of Nannies is a boutique nanny agency placing amazing nannies with families across NYC, Westchester, and the Hamptons.

We’re a small, warm, family-first team—and we’re looking for someone to help us grow and nurture our online community through authentic engagement and email marketing.

What You’ll Do:
You won’t need to create any content—we already have someone for that. Instead, you’ll focus on engagement, visibility, and email list growth across Instagram and Facebook groups.

Your day-to-day will include:
Replying to comments and DMs on Instagram
Following and engaging with ideal clients and local parenting accounts
Commenting on relevant posts (parent influencers, local family businesses, etc.) to build brand visibility

Managing our Facebook groups:
Accepting new members
Welcoming and commenting on member posts
Starting conversations (we’ll provide guidance)
Adding qualified leads to our Flodesk email list
Sending out weekly emails in Flodesk using templates we already have
Helping track growth: new followers, email signups, engagement activity

You’re a Great Fit If:
You love connecting with people and know how to build online relationships
You have experience with Instagram, Facebook groups, and Flodesk
You’re detail-oriented and tech-savvy enough to manage basic email flows
You understand how to engage without sounding salesy
You’re proactive and don’t wait for someone to tell you what to do

Bonus: You’ve worked with family-centered or women-focused brands

Hours & Pay:
Part-time: 20 hours/week
Flexible schedule but must check in on socials at least twice per day
Pay: $400–$600/month depending on experience
This is a long-term, stable role with room to grow

To Apply:
Please send:

A short video or paragraph about you and your experience
Screenshots or examples of Instagram or Facebook engagement you’ve handled
A sample of an email campaign or newsletter (if you have one)
One creative way you’d help our brand connect with more families online
